list.name: Changes
list.comment: Added normalization for evaluation metrics in main.py to address scale differences. Updated graph labels for clarity.

task.summary: Set up PyCharm project with virtual environment, organized directories, initialized Git, and installed dependencies. Added basic configuration and tested setup.
Designed system architecture and created initial project structure. Outlined modules (data handling, ML, visualization, dashboard) and set up directories with placeholders.
Integrated CSV and CV into the Data Handling Module. Implemented loading and preprocessing functions for job data and CV. Tested functionality in main.py.
Added text featurization using TF-IDF and keyword frequency visualization. Integrated functions to analyze job descriptions and CV. Tested in main.py.

Enhanced text processing pipeline with stop-word removal, custom stop words, and lemmatization. Updated preprocessing for CSV and CV data. Verified improvements with updated keyword frequency visualization.
Resolved NLTK resource loading issue by manually downloading punkt and wordnet. Updated preprocessing pipeline to ensure stability.
Implemented CV-job matching using cosine similarity. Added functionality to rank and visualize job descriptions based on similarity scores. Tested ranking and visualization in main.py.

Debugged issue with missing matches in top job rankings. Enhanced preprocessing, adjusted TF-IDF parameters, and added fallback logic for fewer than 5 jobs. Updated visualization to reflect results dynamically.
Implemented functionality to extract top keywords from job descriptions and identify missing keywords in the CV. Added visualization for missing keywords. Verified in main.py.
Added visualizations for CV-job alignment. Implemented a similarity heatmap and an interactive keyword comparison plot. Integrated and tested in main.py.

Fixed cropping issues in all plots by increasing figure size and applying tight layout adjustments. Improved label visibility for keyword frequency, top job matches, missing keywords, and similarity scores heatmap.
Added logging system and integrated across modules. Created configuration file for centralized settings. Implemented exception handling in main.py.
Implemented evaluation metrics for similarity scores and keyword recommendations. Integrated evaluation and visualization into main.py.
Added normalization for evaluation metrics in main.py to address scale differences. Updated graph labels for clarity.
